name: Starship Troopers: Continuum
summary:
Join us on Discord! https://discord.gg/gm6TDs3BeB

Beardo Benjo: “Starship Troopers Continuum is a chunky, punchy feeling arcade shooter that works best when played with friends... it’s also pretty hilarious! You can tell this is the team behind the excellent Zombieland Headshot Fever.”

Rhys Da King: “A game that’s not only packed with intense VR combat but also offers that classic Starship Troopers action fans love. The combat feels good, and those boss battles against giant alien bugs are an absolute...
